headline: Brown & Brown, Inc. earns 2026 Military Friendly® Employer designation and Silver 2026 Military Friendly® Employer Award
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Nov. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brown & Brown, Inc. (NYSE:BRO) is proud to announce that our team of companies earned the 2026 Military Friendly® Employer designation for the second year in a row. Additionally, Brown & Brown has received a Silver 2026 Military Friendly® Award. "Being recognized as a Military Friendly® Employer again and now receiving a Silver Military Friendly® Award is more than just an honor. It’s proof of our dedication to veterans and their families, a
